>
[Steel Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2063) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 191 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=76)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16); [Sentinel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2062)

</column>

---

You wear your armor like a second skin. You can rest normally while wearing medium armor. If you are a master in heavy armor, you can also rest normally while wearing heavy armor.
name: Steel Skin
